channel.title: Goats on The Ocean Code
channel.description: Recent content in Goats on The Ocean Code

item.title: Goats per capita
item.description: Objective A few weeks ago for a post about the relationship between gender equality and GDP/ capita I found a nifty website that has a massive amount of census information for most countries on our planet. Much of this information could be used to answer some very interesting and/ or important questions. But some of the data can be used to answer seemingly pointless questions. And thatâ€™s what I intend to do this week.
